Device:
All Android Wear 1.0 and Wear OS 2.0 devices are supported if they have Play Services e.g.: Moto 360
Fossil
LG Watch
Sony SWR50
Asus ZenWatch
Huawei, Samsung, Polar but only Wear OS-based
TicWatch (only versions with Play Services)
… and many more …
Notes: Battery life on each device depends on the sensor batch queue size, which allows the app to keep the watch in standby most of the time and still collect all data.

Device: Ionic, Versa, Versa Lite, Versa 2, Versa Sense, Versa 3
Notes: You need the Fitbit app

You need to install:
- an addon for phone
- "Sleep As Android - Native Gear Companion" on the watch from the Gear store.

Device: Galaxy Watch, Galaxy Watch Active, Galaxy Watch Active 2
Notes:
You need to install:
- an addon for phone
- "Sleep As Android - Native Gear Companion" on the watch from the Gear store.

You need to install:
- an addon for phone
- "Sleep As Android for Gear Fit 2" watchface on the watch from the Gear store. Read more at Sleep loves Gear Fit 2

Device: Gear Fit 1, Galaxy Fit, Galaxy Fit 2, Galaxy Fit e
Notes: RTOS does not have open API for integration

You need:
- an addon for phone
- a watch app

Supported previously, but not anymore. There was a plugin download an addon.
Made by David Beneda, big thanks!
Sleep works on these kinds of devices out of the box, the same as on a full scale Android smartphone.
